subject: DBUnit. How to use?
msgSnippet: Hi all, Has anyone use DBUnit before? I ve read the write up on the sourceforge site. but quite limited information. Any clear advantages that DBUnit provides?
messageBody:
Hi all,

Has anyone use DBUnit before?
I've read the write up on the sourceforge site. but quite limited
information.

Any clear advantages that DBUnit provides?

I am writing test case on class that performs database operation -
update, select, insert, join, delete, etc. Right now, what i am doing
is that for method that perform SELECT operation, i would first write
some INSERT statment to insert the test data into the database and
then call on the select method. And after that the test, i'll also
need to clear the data. This works, but i find that quite
troublesome. Can DBUnit provides an easier alternative to what i am
doing? Or is there any other easier way?

Is DBUnit tied to any database, Oracle, MySQL, etc?

Thanks lots.

Veny
